rules_text:
When this artifact enters, Amass citizens 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a citizen. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black citizen Army creature token first.)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life and populate. [i](Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]

Rank 2 - Amass + populate don't play well together
